activities: PSC wishes its safe benefits to cover human resources information transferred from the EU for use in the context of the employment relationship.  This information includes but is not limited to hiring information, such as name, address, phone number and personal identification number.  Other types of information transferred from the EU for employment purposes includes hire and termination dates, job title and job descriptions, gender, salary and benefit information.
eucountries: France, United Kingdom, Germany, Belgium, Italy, Spain
privacyprograms: PSC has submitted the $50 fee to the European Data Protection Authorities for dispute resolution.
recoursemech: PSC will cooperate with European Union Data Protection Authorities(DPAs) in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under the Safe Harbor.
